argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ofcc.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. V ) |
| 2 |  | ofcc.2 | |- ( ph -> B e. W ) |
| 3 |  | ofcc.3 | |- ( ph -> C e. X ) |
| 4 |  | #P_fnconstg | |- ( B e. W -> ( A X. { B } ) Fn A ) |
| 5 | 2, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( A X. { B } ) Fn A ) |
| 6 |  | #P_fvconst2g | |- ( ( B e. W /\ x e. A ) -> ( ( A X. { B } ) ` x ) = B ) |
| 7 | 2, 6 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> ( ( A X. { B } ) ` x ) = B ) |
| 8 | 5, 1, 3, 7 | #P_ofcfval | |- ( ph -> ( ( A X. { B } ) oFC R C ) = ( x e. A |-> ( B R C ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_fconstmpt | |- ( A X. { ( B R C ) } ) = ( x e. A |-> ( B R C ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( ph -> ( ( A X. { B } ) oFC R C ) = ( A X. { ( B R C ) } ) ) |
